Class ChangeGiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.ChangeGiver

  • public class ChangeGiver
extends java.lang.Object
    This control object manages the giving of change to the Customer.
    Version:
    1.0 2008-10-01
    Author:
    Team SE16T5E

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      The constructor creates an instance of the object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayChangeStatus()
      This method is used to display the appropriate message on the No Change Available Display depending on the current change availability.
      boolean giveChange(int changeRequired)
      This method manages the issuing of change to the Customer.
      void resetChange()
      This method is used to reset the Refund/ Change Tray display on the Customer Panel.

        public void resetChange()

      • giveChange

        public boolean giveChange(int changeRequired)
        This method manages the issuing of change to the Customer.
        Parameters:
        changeRequired -
        Returns:
        return TRUE if give change use case success, otherwise, return FALSE.

      • displayChangeStatus

        public void displayChangeStatus()
        This method is used to display the appropriate message on the No Change Available Display depending on the current change availability.
